name: Raikou
author: Shin Nagasawa
flavor_text: This rough Pokémon stores energy inside its body, then sweeps across the land, shooting off electricity.

abilities.name: Shining Body
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has any {L} Energy attached to it, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Thunder Lance
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each {L} Energy attached to this Pokémon.
